passages.text:
Stay a while and listen.[[I'd like to hear about the native fish.]]
[[Identify and record fish|Identify]] [[Leave|Leave]]

links.name: I'd like to hear about the native fish.
links.link: I'd like to hear about the native fish.

passages.name: Start

passages.text: Island lore commonly associates colored fish with the hair color of our inhabitants. For example, an unmarried fisherman who catches up several cobia might be destined to meet a partner with dark hair; while catching trumpetfish could indicate a future fling with a blonde.
passages.name: I'd like to hear about the native fish.
